InterestingFacts.Description: The 729-foot-long freighter SS Edmund Fitzgerald sinks during a storm on Lake Superior, killing all 29 crew on board.

MotivationalQuotes.Body: The important thing is not to stop questioning. Curiosity has its own reason for existing.
MotivationalQuotes.Author: Albert Einstein
MotivationalQuotes.Context: It was on this day in 1983 that Bill Gates introduced Windows 1.0, reminding us of the potential innovation brought about by questioning and curiosity.

BornToday.Name: Martin Luther
BornToday.KnownFor: German theologian and seminal figure in the Protestant Reformation

DiedToday.Name: Arthur Rimbaud
DiedToday.KnownFor: French poet known for his influence on modern literature and arts
